author: Mumbai
title: 'Sultan' first official look revealed
text:
'Sultan' first official look revealed Mumbai, Oct 9, 2015 (PTI) Salman Khan's first look from his upcoming Yash Raj Film's action drama "Sultan" has been unveiled, showing the superstar in an intense avatar. 

Salman stars as wrestler from Haryana, Kesari Sultan, in the movie, to be directed by Ali Abbas Zafar.

The 49-year-old "Bajrangi Bhaijaan" star is currently training for the movie. Zafar took to Twitter to share the look.

"Haryana Kesari 'Sultan'. The look says it all...," Zafar wrote alongside the picture, which has a dialogue of character Sultan written on it.

"Wrestling is not a sport. It is about fighting what lies within," it read. Salman also shared the photograph, saying it was taken during the training. "Here is a picture that was taken while training," he captioned the picture. The movie is set to clash with Shah Rukh Khan's "Raees" on July 8, 2016.
